name: 7 Second Haircuts: Speedrun Edition
description:
Take on the role of a barber in this hectic race to the end of the week. Pay rent every day while trying to satisfy your customers' hair dreams! 

With only seven seconds, do you have what it takes?

The Speedrun Edition includes a few quality of life improvements. The timer won't start until you start snipping! Additionally there is a local leaderboard with highscores. And if you can get to the end, you will get a final time. How fast can you cut?!

Press SPACE to finish a haircut early and save time. A faster time gives you a higher score at the end.

Originally Made for What-A-Jam May 2021

Everything in game by Jet Simon
